extendedInfo.description: Are you color blind?  Did you know that there are actually three distinct types of color blindness? Unlike other freely available tests which are simple pass-fail screening tests, the EnChroma test uses the principles of color vision science to measure the type and extent of color vision deficiency.This test was created by the EnChroma team to assist in the correct recommendation of color enhancing eyewear products. EnChroma, Inc. is a Berkeley, CA company that makes innovative eyewear products for medical, industrial and lifestyle markets.  EnChroma eyewear products are based on an advanced multi-band spectral filtering technology that is computer-optimized for use with specific types of color vision.On completion of the test, the type and extent of color vision deficiency will be reported, along with a recommendation for which EnChroma eyewear products are best optimized for use with your vision. A copy of your result can be sent by email from this app.

reviews.title: Issues have been fixed
reviews.comment: As of Feb 6 2013, the following issues are fixed in Version 1.0.3 of the app:  - Fixed a canvas display problem affecting Android 4.1 and later - Improved visual feedback when pressing response buttons - Added test progress indicator to testing screens - Added an \"exit\" button to main screen to close app completely
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Crashes part way through on my RAZR M
reviews.author: Bob Wilson

reviews.title: I guess it works, but
reviews.comment: I\'m not color blind and of course passed.  So I guess it woks.    HOWEVER, it was VERY difficult to exit this program.  I had to click back many times before it would close.  I thought I\'d have to force end.    Apps should CLOSE when you try to CLOSE them!
reviews.author: Derek JA

reviews.title: Not accurate
reviews.comment: Says I\'m partially color blind when run on my xoom\'s lcd  Says I\'m fine when run on my nexus S oled screen
reviews.author: Peter Shipley

reviews.title: Works Great
reviews.comment: Works great for me, test tells you type and severity too!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Color of green(d)
reviews.comment: ADWARE. Test your eyes and see if the green leaves your eyes red.
reviews.author: TE Marc

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: Worked on my bionic. Seemed accurate, as it labeled my color blindness correctly.
reviews.author: Matt Briggs

reviews.title: Inaccurate and buggy
reviews.comment: The reason I gave it one star is because for me, pressing the buttons did nothing in portrait mode. I had to flip to landscape for it to function. I am running jellybean. Also, I tried it twice and came up with two different answers - one stating that I had normal vision, but still prescribed their pricy glasses so I could see better... after it tells me I am not color blind? This is nothing more than an advertisement for pricy sunglasses. Not to mention, their site is down.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: ...but there is no facility to exit the app! A careless oversight.
reviews.author: Stephen Grimes

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Quick and easy
reviews.author: Nick Breeze

reviews.title: Poorly coded ...
